question: I am an Orishan from the Andromeda Galaxy. I have an armored exoskeleton and shoot pressurized water. Who am I?
I resemble a turtle. I can withdraw into my shell and spin to create massive windstorms. Who am I?
I am pure radioactive energy contained in a heavy Russian-accented suit. 'N-R-G is G-O-O-D!' Who am I?
I have jackhammer pistons on my elbows and can trigger earthquakes. Who am I?
I am a jellyfish-like alien that can swim through air, read minds, and shoot electricity. Who am I?
I am a Citrakayah. I am super fast and strong, often compared to XLR8. Who am I?
I am a Chronosapien. I can slow down time or age objects to dust with the key on my head. Who am I?
I look like a robotic beetle. I eat metal and convert it into laser beams shot from my horn. Who am I?
I am a manic goblin who loves to break machines and rebuild them into crazy weapons in seconds. Who am I?
I first appeared in the 'Heroes United' crossover with Generator Rex. I am an electric yeti. Who am I?
I returned in Ultimate Alien wearing a gold-studded gladiator outfit to fight Looma Red Wind. Who am I?
I returned in the UA intro with a darker, rocky charcoal skin tone. Who am I?
I returned with a new look resembling a catfish, with whiskers and huge teeth. Who am I?
I appeared briefly in the crossover event looking sleek and blue. Who am I?
I am an evil version of Ben from an alternate timeline. I returned in Ultimate Alien to destroy all Bens. Who am I?
